notes:
This archive contains the source code and configuration of the speech tools web service available at http://mowa.clarin-pl.eu/mowa. The services provided include:
+ speech to text alignemnt
+ speaker diarization
+ speech transcription
+ speech activity detection and noise classification
+ keyword spotting
